name: Cloudy Puzzle
description:
Hi!

We are a small team of 3 students from France, and this is a school project made in 3 days. It is still in development, we intend to add several levels as well as improvements. 

We need reviews, do not hesitate to give us advice or just opinions, thanks in advance for your time. 

The game is a puzzle platformer in a dreamlike design. You'll need to use your mind and to explore each level to find the good path. 

Good luck !
